about_the_game:
◆Game Overview

This is a rice serving game.

You can serve as much rice as you like.

You can also serve red rice sometimes.

◆System

Serve the rice making sure the bowl is facing the right way.

◆How to Play

Game Controller

A Button / Down Button: Serve

Left Button / Right Button: Pass

B Button / Up Button: Flip the bowl

Keyboard & Mouse

C / S / Down Arrow / Space / Left Click: Serve

X / A / D / Left Arrow / Right Arrow / Right Click: Pass

Z / W / Up Arrow / Mouse Wheel: Flip the bowl
